Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IBackgroundProcessingManager

  • public interface IBackgroundProcessingManager
    Interface which should be implemented to provide registration of background processing functions to the SDK. The class implementing this interface will be created within the SDK service process and may be used while the application is in the background.
    Since:
    3.15.14

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IClientSideAdsParserProvider getClientSideAdsParserProvider()  
      IDASHManifestRenditionSelector getDASHManifestRenditionSelector()
      Return a custom track selector, enabling the application to choose which video representation from each adaptation set to download.
      IHLSManifestRenditionSelector getHLSManifestRenditionSelector()
      Return a custom rendition selector, enabling the application to choose which video representation from the available submanifests to download.
      IManifestParserObserver getManifestParserObserver()
      Return a manifest parser observer, to detect and manipulate segments during parsing
      IPlaylistAssetProvider getPlaylistProvider()  
      IPrepareURLObserver getSegmentPrepareObserver()  

    • Method Detail

      • getManifestParserObserver

        IManifestParserObserver getManifestParserObserver()
        Return a manifest parser observer, to detect and manipulate segments during parsing
        Returns:
        An implementation of a manifest parser observer, or null otherwise.
        See Also:
        IManifestParserObserver

      • getDASHManifestRenditionSelector

        IDASHManifestRenditionSelector getDASHManifestRenditionSelector()
        Return a custom track selector, enabling the application to choose which video representation from each adaptation set to download. Audio and CC tracks are still selected automatically based upon the other filters and settings available in the SDK.
        Returns:
        An implementation of a rendition selector for DASH video representations, or null otherwise.

      • getHLSManifestRenditionSelector

        IHLSManifestRenditionSelector getHLSManifestRenditionSelector()
        Return a custom rendition selector, enabling the application to choose which video representation from the available submanifests to download. Audio and CC tracks are still selected automatically based upon the other filters and settings available in the SDK.
        Returns:
        An implementation of a rendition selector for HLS video, or null otherwise.
        See Also:
        IHLSManifestRenditionSelector

      • getClientSideAdsParserProvider

        IClientSideAdsParserProvider getClientSideAdsParserProvider()
        Returns:
        An implementation of a client side ads parser provider, or null otherwise.
        See Also:
        IClientSideAdsParserProvider

      • getPlaylistProvider

        IPlaylistAssetProvider getPlaylistProvider()
        Returns:
        An implementation of a playlist asset provider, or null otherwise
        See Also:
        IPlaylistAssetProvider

      • getSegmentPrepareObserver

        IPrepareURLObserver getSegmentPrepareObserver()
        Returns:
        An implementation of a url preparation observer, or null otherwise
        Since:
        3.17.1
        See Also:
        IPrepareURLObserver
